alert.note: Alert for Northern Gila County; Oak Creek and Sycamore Canyons; White Mountains; Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued June 26 at 1:56AM MST until June 27 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING FOR MOST OF CENTRAL AND NORTHERN ARIZONA... * AFFECTED AREA...Most of central and northern Arizona, except for locations near Page and Glen Canyon. * WINDS...Southwest 20 to 30 mph, with gusts from 40 to 50 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...8 to 14 percent. * IMPACTS...The combination of gusty winds and low humidity can cause fire to rapidly grow in size and intensity before first responders can contain them.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are possible. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings. Please notify field crews of this Fire Weather Watch.

area.areaDesc: Northern Gila County; Oak Creek and Sycamore Canyons; White Mountains; Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins
